item.title: About
item.description: When NCAA tournament time approaches every march, college basketball fans wait in anticipation for what teams are seeded higher and lower. However the higher seed teams still loose to lower seeded teams and massive upsets happen every year. This blog is dedicated to figuring out correct seeding for the NCAA tournament based on stats because people lie but numbers don’t.
